reasoning: Schwannoma (nerve sheath tumor). Incidence ~1-2 per 100k, with vestibular schwannomas being most common subtype. Estimate of 1.5 per 100k based on tumor registry data. Moderate confidence due to regional variation and underdiagnosis of asymptomatic cases.
source: Evans DG et al. (2005). Incidence of vestibular schwannoma and neurofibromatosis 2. Am J Med Genet. 136:148-155
